name: Leipzig in a nutshell!
description: For many foreigners, Leipzig is very much an underrated city in Germany - and perhaps for that reason it has kept its original charm and has not been spoiled in the same way that many claim Berlin has been. Often called 'the better Berlin', Leipzig is comparable, but has a lot more green space and water more accessible to the city centre and has generally a much fresher feel to it. This tour will give you a deep insight into the fastest growing city in eastern Germany and leave you loving with this wonderful city.
